headline: Nvidia and Other Big Tech Stocks That Are Cheaper Than You Might Think
summary: Nvidia  is one of those stocks.  Nvidia  is expected to report second-quarter earnings at the end of August, but investors could get a taste of demand for the company’s hardware as other tech companies report their AI spending plans in the weeks ahead.  Meanwhile, Nvidia investors have celebrated the stock’s comeback from April lows, with share now up 21% this year.

headline: Micron Tech Financial Chief to Sell $20 Million of Stock
summary: Mark Murphy, chief financial officer of memory-chip maker Micron, plans to sell up to 162,000 shares.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks to Research Further
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.
